      • renderRestarting

        public void renderRestarting()
        Description copied from interface: ItemPlotter3D
        Called just before a render of the visualisation is about to start. This can be used to prepare context objects for the plotObject method.
        Specified by:
        renderRestarting in interface ItemPlotter3D<DotPlotVisualisation.ColouredDot>

      • plotObject

        public void plotObject(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable,
                       XYZVisualisation3D.LocatedObject3D<DotPlotVisualisation.ColouredDot> object,
                       AxesRenderer3D renderer)
        Description copied from interface: ItemPlotter3D
        Plots a specific object to the 3D visualisation using the AxesRenderer3D to provide the position of the object. Should side affect the given image.

        object - The object
        renderer - The axes renderer
